thread.title: Pat Knight

author: Pat Knight
title: Pat Knight
text:
Ordered A Sharp Microwave from AO, had to ring them with a query was helpful in sorting it out for me.
It arrived on time, driver was friendly, bigger than I thought but fitted in unit, was a bit muddled in working it at first, but book explained everything, after awhile I managed to sort out how to hot up dinners, I've cooked porridge in it, showed hubby how to work it. I don't cook things like casserole or vegetables, just really simple things, this will be ok for us with what we need it for. Glad it has other options though, child lock, pre cook settings, it has a timer to automatically start cooking say a casserole which my other one never had. Mind you my old one was a Sharp & I had it for over 16 years, so that's why I went with the same make, reliable, not very pricey, stylish, just wish I had a bigger kitchen to have it on display, shame to hide it. I love it so far so good let's hope it lives up to my other one.
